Uses of Package
com.acmetelecom

  • Packages that use com.acmetelecom 
    Package Description
    com.acmetelecom  
    tests  
  • Classes in com.acmetelecom used by com.acmetelecom 
    Class and Description
    Bill
    Stores information about a customer's bill.
    Call
    Contains information about a specific call.
    CallEvent
    Contains information about a call event.
    CallStart
    Represents a call start event.
    IBillGenerator
    The BillGenerator interface which all bill generators should implement.
    IBillingSystem
    The billing system interface which all billing systems should implement.
    IBillPrinter
    The BillPrinter interface which all types of bill printer should implement.
    ICallCostCalculator
    The CallCostCalculator interface which all call cost calculator implementations should implement.
    ICallEventManager
    The CallEventManager interface which all call event managers should implement.
    IClock
    The clock interface which all clocks should implement.
    IPeakPeriod
    Defines the interface for a class describing a peak period.
    IPeakPeriod.DayPeriod
    Defines the periods in a day.
    LineItem
    Represents an call item to be put in a customer's bill.
  • Classes in com.acmetelecom used by tests 
    Class and Description
    BillingSystem
    High-level billing system logic, concerned with storing call events and creating customer bills.
    Call
    Contains information about a specific call.
    CallCostCalculator
    Contains logic for calculating call costs.
    CallEventManager
    The CallEventManager is responsible for handling call events, grouping them together to make complete calls and storing the call logs for all customers.
    DaytimePeakPeriod
    Holds all information about when peak period starts/ends and methods related to this.
    HtmlBillGenerator
    Responsible for generating bills in HTML form.
    HtmlBillPrinter
    Responsible for printing parts of a bill in HTML form.
    IBillGenerator
    The BillGenerator interface which all bill generators should implement.
    IBillingSystem
    The billing system interface which all billing systems should implement.
    IBillPrinter
    The BillPrinter interface which all types of bill printer should implement.
    ICallCostCalculator
    The CallCostCalculator interface which all call cost calculator implementations should implement.
    ICallEventManager
    The CallEventManager interface which all call event managers should implement.
    IClock
    The clock interface which all clocks should implement.
    IPeakPeriod
    Defines the interface for a class describing a peak period.
